message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. I'm asking for $11,000.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more than that to you.  How about we split the difference and settle at $10,500?
Alice, I've given this some thought and I'd like to counter with an offer of $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I can come down a bit further, but not to $9,500. Would you consider $10,250?
Alice, I'm glad you're willing to negotiate further. I would like to propose $9,750 as my offer for the product. I hope this is within your range.
